div.p: P60/9122, unit 748, VPRS 1189/P inward registered correspondence, VA 475 Chief Secretary's Department, Public Record Office, Victoria.
I have the honor to solicit, that you will be pleased to sanction the following expenditure in this establishment during the remaining quarter of the year.

cell.style: padding-left: 0.0556in; padding-right: 0.0556in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border: none;
cell.p: Wages according to the scale allowed in the preceeding quarter (being the sum of £1040 not applied for a £74.16.— balance unexpended of the wages votes of the past quarter of the year)

cell.style: padding-left: 0.0556in; padding-right: 0.0556in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border: none;
padding-left: 0.0556in; padding-right: 0.0556in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border: none;
cell.p:
For publishing a work on the indigenous plants
B62.03.03.

cell.style: padding-left: 0.0556in; padding-right: 0.0556in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border: none;
padding-left: 0.0556in; padding-right: 0.0556in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border: none;
cell.p: For the purchase of animals and expenses connected with their introduction (including Mr Ledgers expenses of bringing two additional male Alpacas to the colony)
